Package org.apache.kafka.connect.mirror

Class RemoteClusterUtils

java.lang.Object
org.apache.kafka.connect.mirror.RemoteClusterUtils
public final class RemoteClusterUtils extends Object
Convenience methods for multi-cluster environments. Wraps MirrorClient

Properties passed to these methods are used to construct internal Admin and Consumer clients. Sub-configs like "admin.xyz" are also supported. For example: 

      bootstrap.servers = host1:9092
      consumer.client.id = mm2-client

See Also:
  • for additional properties used by the internal MirrorClient.

    • translateOffsets

      public static Map<TopicPartition,OffsetAndMetadata> translateOffsets(Map<String,Object> properties, String remoteClusterAlias, String consumerGroupId, Duration timeout) throws InterruptedException, TimeoutException
      Translate a remote consumer group's offsets into corresponding local offsets. Topics are automatically renamed according to the ReplicationPolicy.
      Parameters:
      properties - MirrorClientConfig properties to instantiate a MirrorClient
      consumerGroupId - group ID of remote consumer group
      remoteClusterAlias - alias of remote cluster
      timeout - timeout
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
      TimeoutException
